mapper.sql: SELECT btt.bid_item_id AS bidItemId, btt.bid_item_name AS bidItemName, btt.bid_item_desc AS bidItemDesc, btt.start_price AS startPrice, btt.max_price AS maxPrice, btt.bid_start_date AS bidStartDate, btt.bid_end_date AS bidEndDate, btt.item_status AS itemStatus, btt.created_by AS memberId, btt.cid AS itemCategoryId, ct.cname as cname, bii.bid_img_name AS bidImgName, bii.bid_img_url AS bidImgUrl, bii.bid_ori_img_name AS bidOriImgName, (SELECT MAX(bt.bid_reg_price) FROM bids_tbl bt WHERE bt.bid_item_id = btt.bid_item_id) AS bidNowPrice, (SELECT count(bt.bid_reg_price) FROM bids_tbl bt WHERE bt.bid_item_id = btt.bid_item_id) AS bidcount, mg.mgid AS mgId, mg.member_grade_status AS mgst FROM bid_items_tbl btt JOIN bid_item_img bii ON btt.bid_item_id = bii.bid_item_id LEFT JOIN member_grade_tbl mg ON btt.member_id = mg.member_id join category_tbl ct on btt.cid = ct.cid WHERE bii.bid_repimg_yn = 'Y'
mapper.select: AND btt.created_by = #{createdBy} order by btt.bid_end_date desc

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY bt.reg_time desc) AS rownum, bt.bino AS bino, bt.reg_time AS regtime, bt.bid_reg_price AS bidregprice, bt.created_by AS createdBy, bt.bid_item_id AS biditemid FROM bids_tbl bt WHERE bt.bid_item_id = #{bidItemId} ) subquery WHERE subquery.rownum > 0
